```{r, cache = TRUE}

                                  n = col_double(),

                                  VOX = col_double(),

                                  PACMA = col_double(),
```

```{r}
good_firms <- spain %>% 
  count(firm) %>% 
  filter(n >= 40) %>% 
  pull(firm)

good_firms
```
